Room.Name: Lelion Wildlife Preserve
Room.ShortDescription: You are at a small cove on the Lithium Inlet, in the wildlife preserve.
Room.LongDescription: The waters of the inlet swirl and eddy here, not moving near as fast as the center of the inlet to the north. The banks leading to the water's edge are grassy and inviting, and a wooden pier, apparently in good condition, extends into the clean and cold water.
